text: aur usakee jaati ke log daudate hue usake paas aa gaye aur isase poorv vah kukarm[1] kiya karate the. loot ne kahaah he meree jaati ke logo! ye meree[2] putriyaan hain, ve tumhaare lie adhik pavitr hain, atah allaah se daro aur mere atithiyon ke baare mein mujhe apamaanit na karo. kya tumamen koee bhala manushy nahin hai
